vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "CErc20Delegator::_setImplementation: Caller must be admin");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-custom-error-not-require
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.value == 0,"CErc20Delegator:fallback: cannot send value to fallback");
vulnerability_findings.message: Consider using custom errors as they are more gas efficient while allowing developers  to describe the error in detail using NatSpec.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.sender == admin, "CErc20Delegator::_setImplementation: Caller must be admin");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: use-short-revert-string
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code: require(msg.value == 0,"CErc20Delegator:fallback: cannot send value to fallback");
vulnerability_findings.message: Shortening revert strings to fit in 32 bytes will decrease gas costs for deployment and  gas costs when the revert condition has been met.

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20Delegator.delegateTo (CErc20Delegator.sol#894-902) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success,returnData) = callee.delegatecall(data) (CErc20Delegator.sol#895)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
CErc20Delegator.delegateAndReturn (CErc20Delegator.sol#944-955) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	(success) = implementation.delegatecall(msg.data) (CErc20Delegator.sol#945)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: CErc20Delegator.delegateToViewImplementation (CErc20Delegator.sol#921-929) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: CErc20Delegator.delegateToViewAndReturn (CErc20Delegator.sol#931-942) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CErc20Delegator._setImplementation (CErc20Delegator.sol#551-564):
	External calls:
	- delegateToImplementation(abi.encodeWithSignature(_resignImplementation())) (CErc20Delegator.sol#555)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- implementation (CErc20Delegator.sol#559)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in CErc20Delegator.constructor (CErc20Delegator.sol#515-543):
	External calls:
	- delegateTo(implementation_,abi.encodeWithSignature(initialize(address,address,address,uint256,string,string,uint8),underlying_,comptroller_,interestRateModel_,initialExchangeRateMantissa_,name_,symbol_,decimals_)) (CErc20Delegator.sol#529-536)
	- _setImplementation(implementation_,false,becomeImplementationData) (CErc20Delegator.sol#539)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- admin (CErc20Delegator.sol#542)
